docs.text:
Welcome to Multipyer


Multipyer is a complete solution for creating online multiplayer games using Python.


Quick start


Install the latest version of Material with 
pip
:


pip install multipyer




Add the following line to your Python file:


from multipyer import Server
server = Server()




For detailed instructions see the 
getting started guide
.
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: Multipyer is a complete solution for creating online multiplayer games using Python.

docs.title: Quick start

docs.text:
Installation


PIP


The simplest way to install the Multipyer Client module is by using 
pip
:


pip install multipyer




The multipyer client supports all versions of Python 3.


Github


Alternatively, the module can be locally installed by cloning the github repository
and copying the 'multipyer' folder to the folder that contains your project.
